room_title: Escape room "Bequest" by Sequestered Escape Room Adventures in Baton Rouge
review: Was a lot of fun, had a lot of great puzzles with super unique and clever elements!!

room_title: Escape room "Bequest" by Sequestered Escape Room Adventures in Baton Rouge
review: Had a great time! Very well done!!

room_title: Escape room "Bequest" by Sequestered Escape Room Adventures in Baton Rouge
review: staff is very friendly. we really enjoyed both of the escape rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Bequest" by Sequestered Escape Room Adventures in Baton Rouge
review: Absolutely fantastic! Staff is phenomenal and provided the perfect amount of interaction. Rooms are very well taken care of and puzzles work properly. As an avid escape room enthusiast, I will say that Bequest was difficult but not impossible. Looking forward to trying the diner next!
